page.title: 05CROWAN COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: On Wednesdays there are craft groups. There is weaving, tie dying, needlework, sketching, woodwork, macrame' and collage. There is a netball and football team in winter. In summer there is a cricket and rounders team. There is assembly every Monday and Friday and hymn practice on Wednesday. On Wednesday June, 26th, 1985 there was Sports Day. The school day starts at 9.a.m. and ends at 3.30.p.m. There are three playtimes 10.30.-10.45.a.m. 12.30.-1.15.p.m. and 2.30.-2.45.p.m. On a Wednesday some of us go swimming at 2.45.p.m. and we get back at 4.30.p.m. On a Thursday some of the older people go swimming at 3.00.-4.30.p.m. Every Friday some of class 3 do gardening. There is a greenhouse and in it we grow tomatoes, melons and cucumbers.
